feed.title: PlikShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.3
entry.content:
Changes: - [SECURITY-FIX] Antiforgery token mechanism introduced (CSRF attacks prevention)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.2...v1.1.3

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.4
entry.content:
Changes: - [FEATURE] Additional sign-up checkboxes can be configured (required or optional) in the General Settings page - [FIX] Bulk upload works correctly for archives that contain files only (no folders)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.3...v1.1.4

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.5
entry.content:
Changes: - [FEATURE] Workspaces can have now a size limit - [IMPROVEMENT] Workspace size counter is now updated instantly each time a file is uploaded or deleted

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.4...v1.1.5

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.6
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] Max workspace number and Default max workspace size added to user configuration
  • [IMPROVEMENT] Workspace size configuration control unified with its user config counterpart

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.5...v1.1.6

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.7
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] New user default configuration section added to the General Settings page

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.6...v1.1.7
